text: NS4 of BTV and GIV were successfully cloned into pGEX-4T-2 and expressed in C41 at 28uC, as partially soluble proteins fused to GST (figure 2). The soluble fraction was used in competition assays with DNase I or endoribonucleases belonging to the RNAse III family and in binding assays with dsRNA. In contrast when these proteins were expressed in BL-21 they were totally insoluble and formed inclusion bodies. The inclusion bodies fraction was purified using bugbuster reagent, solubilised and used for immunization of rabbits.
